nodes.long_description:
**CleanSheet Pro – Treina Gratuitamente durante 7 Dias!**

Treina como um jogador profissional com o simulador de guarda-redes em VR mais avançado do mundo. Criado pelos desenvolvedores de CleanSheet Soccer, o CleanSheet Pro redefine a forma como os guarda-redes treinam, medem o seu desempenho e competem — tudo no conforto de casa. Começa hoje com um período de teste gratuito de 7 dias.

# PLANOS DE SUBSCRIÇÃO

**Plano Anual**

●  €18.49 / mês

**Plano Mensal**

●  €13.99 no primeiro mês

●  €27.99 / mês depois

# ENFRENTA SITUAÇÕES REAIS DE JOGO

Experimenta remates autênticos capturados por motion capture — desde cantos com efeito até penáltis precisos — que colocam à prova os teus reflexos e calma sob pressão.

{1380073573723103}

# COMPETE CONTRA OS MELHORES

Aperfeiçoa reflexos, posicionamento e tomada de decisão enquanto a tua pontuação GKIQ (Goalkeeping Intelligence) se ajusta ao teu nível. Ativa o modo Profiler para te comparares com um guarda-redes profissional ou internacional.

{1349390370300409}

# CONSTRÓI A TUA CARREIRA

Representa o clube que escolheres, sobe na carreira através de desafios mensais de promoção e melhora o teu estádio — mas mantém-te em forma para evitar a despromoção.

{855027523689531}

# APP COMPANHEIRA

Acompanha estatísticas, agenda treinos e partilha o teu progresso com treinadores ou amigos através da CleanSheet Pro Companion App (disponível para iOS e Android).

{4121933694711945}
nodes.short_description: Treina como um futebolista profissional com o simulador de guarda-redes em VR mais avançado do mundo. Dos criadores de CleanSheet Soccer, o CleanSheet Pro revoluciona a forma como os guarda-redes treinam, acompanham o progresso e competem — tudo a partir de casa.

nodes.long_description:
**CleanSheet Pro – Train Free for 7 Days!**

Train like a pro soccer player with the world’s most advanced VR goalkeeping simulator. From the creators of CleanSheet Soccer, CleanSheet Pro revolutionizes how goalkeepers train, track progress, and compete — all from home. Start today with a 7-day free trial.

# SUBSCRIPTION PLANS
**Annual Plan**

● $19.99/month 

**Monthly Plan**

●  $14.99 for the first month

●  $29.99/month thereafter


# FACE REAL MATCH SCENARIOS

Experience authentic, motion-captured shots from inswinging corners to precise penalties, testing your reactions and composure under pressure.

{4575400166079375}

# COMPETE AGAINST THE BEST

Sharpen reactions, positioning, and decision-making as your GKIQ (Goalkeeping Intelligence) score adapts to your skill level. Activate Profiler Mode to measure yourself against a professional and international keeper.

{1554802648934483}

# BUILD YOUR CAREER

Represent your chosen club, climb the Career ladder through monthly promotion challenges, and upgrade your stadium — but stay sharp to avoid relegation.

{1169154811239375}

# COMPANION APP

Track stats, schedule drills, and share progress with coaches or friends through the CleanSheet Pro Companion App (available on IOS and Android).

{1372677117924089}
nodes.short_description: Train like a pro soccer player with the world’s most advanced VR goalkeeping simulator. From the creators of CleanSheet Soccer, CleanSheet Pro revolutionizes how goalkeepers train, track progress, and compete — all from home.

nodes.long_description:
**CleanSheet Pro – 7 Tage kostenlos trainieren!**

Trainiere wie ein Profi mit dem weltweit modernsten VR-Torwart-Simulator. Von den Entwicklern von CleanSheet Soccer setzt CleanSheet Pro neue Maßstäbe dafür, wie Torhüter trainieren, ihren Fortschritt messen und sich mit anderen messen können – alles bequem von zu Hause. Starte noch heute mit einer kostenlosen 7-Tage-Testphase.

# ABO-PLÄNE

**Jahresabo**

● €18.49 / Monat

**Monatsabo**

●  €13.99 für den ersten Monat

●  €27.99 / Monat danach

# ERLEBE ECHTE SPIELSITUATIONEN

Erlebe authentische, motion-gecapturte Schüsse – von einziehenden Ecken bis hin zu präzisen Elfmetern – und stelle deine Reaktionen und Nervenstärke unter Druck auf die Probe.

{841916378444844}

# MISSE DICH MIT DEN BESTEN

Schärfe deine Reaktionen, Positionierung und Entscheidungsfindung, während sich dein GKIQ-Wert (Goalkeeping Intelligence) deinem Leistungsniveau anpasst. Aktiviere den Profiler-Modus, um dich mit einem professionellen und internationalen Torhüter zu vergleichen.

{1382277196583728}

# STARTE DEINE KARRIERE

Repräsentiere deinen gewählten Verein, erklimme die Karriereleiter durch monatliche Aufstiegs-Challenges und verbessere dein Stadion – aber bleib fokussiert, um nicht abzusteigen.

{2176238776115422}

# COMPANION-APP

Verfolge Statistiken, plane Trainings und teile Fortschritte mit Trainern oder Freunden über die CleanSheet Pro Companion App (verfügbar für iOS und Android).

{827109056813464}
nodes.short_description: Trainiere wie ein Profifußballer mit dem weltweit fortschrittlichsten VR-Torwart-Simulator. Von den Machern von CleanSheet Soccer revolutioniert CleanSheet Pro, wie Torhüter trainieren, Fortschritte verfolgen und konkurrieren – und das alles von zu Hause aus.

nodes.long_description:
**CleanSheet Pro – Provalo Gratis per 7 Giorni!**

Allenati come un giocatore professionista con il simulatore di portiere in VR più avanzato al mondo. Dai creatori di CleanSheet Soccer, CleanSheet Pro ridefinisce il modo in cui i portieri si allenano, misurano i miglioramenti e competono con gli altri — comodamente da casa. Inizia oggi con una prova gratuita di 7 giorni.

# PIANI DI ABBONAMENTO

**Piano Annuale**

●  €18.49 / mese

**Piano Mensile**

●  €13.99 per il primo mese

●  €27.99 / mese successivi

# AFFRONTA VERE SITUAZIONI DI GARA

Vivi tiri autentici catturati in motion capture — da corner ad effetto a rigori precisi — per mettere alla prova i tuoi riflessi e la tua compostezza sotto pressione.

{3751872265122214}

# METTITI ALLA PROVA CONTRO I MIGLIORI

Affina riflessi, posizionamento e capacità decisionali mentre il tuo punteggio GKIQ (Goalkeeping Intelligence) si adatta al tuo livello. Attiva la Modalità Profiler per confrontarti con un portiere professionista o internazionale.

{811901611846787}

# COSTRUISCI LA TUA CARRIERA

Rappresenta il club che scegli, scala la carriera attraverso sfide mensili di promozione e migliora il tuo stadio — ma resta in forma per evitare la retrocessione.

{1405845964221847}

# APP COMPAGNA

Monitora statistiche, programma allenamenti e condividi i tuoi progressi con allenatori o amici tramite la CleanSheet Pro Companion App (disponibile su iOS e Android).


{2588273064882134}
nodes.short_description: Allenati come un calciatore professionista con il simulatore di portiere in VR più avanzato al mondo. Dai creatori di CleanSheet Soccer, CleanSheet Pro rivoluziona il modo in cui i portieri si allenano, monitorano i progressi e competono — tutto da casa.

**CleanSheet Pro – Train Free for 7 Days!**

nodes.short_description: Train like a pro footballer with the world’s most advanced VR goalkeeping simulator. From the creators of CleanSheet Soccer, CleanSheet Pro revolutionizes how goalkeepers train, track progress, and compete — all from home.

nodes.long_description:
**CleanSheet Pro – 7 jours d’essai gratuit!**

Entraîne-toi comme un joueur professionnel avec le simulateur de gardien de but en VR le plus avancé au monde. Issu des créateurs de CleanSheet Soccer, CleanSheet Pro redéfinit la façon dont les gardiens s’entraînent, mesurent leurs performances et se comparent aux autres — le tout depuis chez eux. Commence dès aujourd’hui avec un essai gratuit de 7 jours.

# FORMULES D’ABONNEMENT

**Abonnement annuel**

●  €18.49 / mois

**Abonnement mensuel**

●  €13.99 pour le premier mois

●  €27.99/ mois ensuite

# AFFRONTE DE VRAIES SITUATIONS DE MATCH

Découvre des tirs authentiques capturés en motion capture — des corners rentrants aux penalties précis — mettant à l’épreuve tes réflexes et ton sang-froid sous pression.

{2351917781988635}

# MESURE-TOI AUX MEILLEURS

Améliore tes réflexes, ton placement et ta prise de décision tandis que ton score GKIQ (Goalkeeping Intelligence) s’adapte à ton niveau. Active le Mode Profiler pour te comparer à un gardien professionnel ou international.

{1502786561025355}

# CONSTRUIS TA CARRIÈRE

Représente le club de ton choix, progresse dans la carrière grâce à des défis mensuels de promotion et améliore ton stade — mais reste performant pour éviter la relégation.

{836800349271752}

# APPLICATION COMPAGNON

Suis tes statistiques, planifie tes exercices et partage tes progrès avec des entraîneurs ou des amis grâce à l’application compagnon CleanSheet Pro (disponible sur iOS et Android).

{1349628689549835}
nodes.short_description: Entraîne-toi comme un footballeur professionnel avec le simulateur de gardien de but en VR le plus avancé au monde. Créé par les développeurs de CleanSheet Soccer, CleanSheet Pro révolutionne la manière dont les gardiens s’entraînent, suivent leurs progrès et rivalisent — directement depuis chez eux.

nodes.long_description:
From the creators of CleanSheet Soccer, CleanSheet Pro brings a new era of VR goalkeeping. Build your skills, evolve your career, and receive fresh updates through an ongoing subscription.

# ⚽ Choose Your Club, Forge Your Identity
Choose your club and represent your team on the global stage — with a fully immersive Home Room styled in your club’s colors, serving as your personal base of operations.

{1620698378623842}

# 🏆 Climb the Career Ladder

Work your way up from Base League to Legends League. Earn new gloves, upgraded stadiums, and transfer offers as you prove your skills. Weekly objectives and club competitions keep your career moving forward.

{882803883972164}

# 🎯 Performance-Driven Drills

Train like a pro with virtual goalkeeping equipment. From rebounders to ball launchers, every session is designed to build real goalkeeping skills and track your progress over time.

{693377389826402}

# 🥅 Real Match Scenarios

Face the same challenges real goalkeepers do. Using motion capture from professional players, CleanSheet Pro recreates authentic match moments — from inswinging corners to knuckleball free kicks — pushing your positioning, reactions, and instincts to the limit.

{1154197743057661}

# 📧 Join Our Mailing List

Be the first to know. Sign up to get exclusive updates on CleanSheet Pro’s development, beta opportunities, and launch announcements — straight from the team building the future of VR goalkeeping.

👉 https://forms.gle/NTUVNkEr44tdzLip8

{1809838419606420}
nodes.short_description: From the creators of CleanSheet Soccer, CleanSheet Pro brings a new era of VR goalkeeping. Build your skills, evolve your career, and receive fresh updates through an ongoing subscription.
